The Company of the Howling Harpoon was a mercenary band that aided the city of Hlondeth against Turmish invaders in 146 DR.
In the  armies of Turmish under the command of Lord Dempster besieged the nations old enemy â€“ the city-state of Hlondeth. While the front assault was broken by the citys defenders, the Company of the Howling Harpoon flanked Turmite armies. The mercenaries destroyed Dempsters food supplies and siege mechanisms, forcing the invading army to retreat.
